title: Previous banners
body: So this is more of a personal aesthetic thing but i noticed when you hover over some players names, they have banners that date back season 2/3 of their rank back then, I also played in season 3 and was bronze as well as season 4 silver but I don't have those banners under my name, is this a glitch or did i have to make posts during that time in order to receive those banners

replies.body:
I'm pretty sure the boards banners are only for gold+ every year.
You're talking about the ones I see (Gold, Plat) when I hover your name right?

Not a glitch!  Your banner may change depending on the summoner icon you have equipped.  For example, if you want to have Pulsefire Ezreal's banner then you'll have to equip his icon.  Let me know if that clears things up!
